feature.title: Save staff from having to call/email/fax multiple times to coordinate care.
feature.subtitle: Automated tools that proactively reach out to patients to ensure they have gotten their medications, are following their care plan, and are able to make it to their appointments.

feature.title: No more lost revenue due to hospital readmissions, lost referrals, and no shows.
feature.subtitle: Improve outcomes and lower costs with technology and skilled workers coordinating care at every step.

feature.title: Incoming records are parsed for PHI and categorized.
feature.subtitle: Stop spending hours finding the necessary patient information in faxes and re-typing the data into your computer. Our artificial intelligence tells you what is in the documents.

feature.title: Make patient forms electronic and mobile compatible.
feature.subtitle: Patients can fill out forms faster and more accurately from their own devices. View the results online and import into the EHR.

feature.title: Data security is the first priority
feature.subtitle: All our processes are HIPAA compliant. We use advanced encryption standards to encrypt data at rest and at transit.

feature.title: EHR integration.
feature.subtitle: We integrate with your EHR to ensure a seamless experience for you.
